Uses of Class
io.honeycomb.libhoney.TransportOptions.Builder

  • Packages that use TransportOptions.Builder 
    Package Description
    io.honeycomb.libhoney
    Classes that define the public API; see the 'examples' module for simple use-cases.

    • Uses of TransportOptions.Builder in io.honeycomb.libhoney

      Methods in io.honeycomb.libhoney that return TransportOptions.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setBatchSize​(int batchSize)
      This determines that maximum number of events that get sent to the Honeycomb server (via a batch request).
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setBatchTimeoutMillis​(long batchTimeoutMillis)
      If batches do no fill up to the batch size in time (as defined by setBatchSize(int)), then this timeout will trigger a batch request to the Honeycomb server.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setBufferSize​(int bufferSize)
      Set this to define the http client's socket buffer size in bytes.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setConnectionRequestTimeout​(int connectionRequestTimeout)
      Set this to define the http client's connection request timeout in milliseconds.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setConnectTimeout​(int connectTimeout)
      Set this to define the http client's connect timeout in milliseconds.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setIoThreadCount​(int ioThreadCount)
      Set this to define the http client's io thread count.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setMaxConnections​(int maxConnections)
      Set this to define the maximum amount of connections the http client may hold in its connection pool.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setMaxConnectionsPerApiHost​(int maxConnectionsPerApiHost)
      Set this to define the maximum amount of connections the http client may hold in its connection pool for a given hostname.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setMaximumHttpRequestShutdownWait​(long maximumHttpRequestShutdownWait)
      Defines the maximum time (in milliseconds) that we should wait for any pending HTTP requests to complete during the client shutdown process.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setMaximumPendingBatchRequests​(int maximumPendingBatchRequests)
      This determines the maximum number of batch requests that can be still pending completion at any one time.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setQueueCapacity​(int queueCapacity)
      This sets the capacity of the queue that events are submitted to before they get processed for batching and eventually sent to the honeycomb HTTP endpoint.
      TransportOptions.Builder TransportOptions.Builder.setSocketTimeout​(int socketTimeout)
      Set this to define the http client's socket timeout in milliseconds.
      static TransportOptions.Builder LibHoney.transportOptions​()
      Static method to obtain an instance of the builder of TransportOptions, which offers more advanced configuration options for customising the HoneyClient transport.
